name: A pair of heavy black gauntlets
data: It increases the users strength magnificently.
It decreases the users dexterity slightly.
It increases the users constitution somewhat.
It has awesome armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It increases the users cold resistance adequately.
It increases the users fire resistance adequately.
While worn, these gauntlets increase all magical damage dealt by a substantial amount.
